trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_SEQ_00<tab>Takotsubo is searching for someone to take his striped ray out for a swim.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_00<tab>Pass through the first marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_01<tab>Pass through the second marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_02<tab>Pass through the third marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_03<tab>Pass through the fourth marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_04<tab>Pass through the fifth marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_05<tab>Pass through the sixth marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_06<tab>Pass through the seventh marker on the striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TODO_07<tab>Pass through the final marker on the striped ray.

TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_000<tab>Hello, hello! Welcome to Tamamizu, friend. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> from the surface, though you may be, I sense you enjoy swimming a great deal. You would get along quite well with my striped ray here.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_001<tab>More than anything, she loves to wade through the waters and eat the small fish as she goes.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_002<tab>She would be over the moon if you would take her for a quick swim around the village.
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_003<tab>Did she buck you off or did you fall, friend? Hahaha! Either way, if you are willing to give it another try, I am sure she is, too!

TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_010<tab>Welcome back! I trust you enjoyed the ride? By the swishing of her tail, I can tell my striped ray, certainly did! Or, perhaps, she simply ate something that did not sit right with her.

TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_011<tab>Hahaha! She devours everything that crosses her path, especially things that glisten. Once she swallowed an entire coffer's worth of gold coins we found on a sunken ship!
TEXT_STMBDZ313_02709_TAKOTSUBO_000_012<tab>In any case, I thank you for taking her out. Do be sure to come back to visit sometime. She has taken quite a shine to you!
